content.title: test.py
content.layoutDescription: Code editor open with Python code
content.visibleText:
def test1():
 res = sf_connection.get_applications(['GA-Cat.*'])
 print(res[:10])
 print(res[-10:])
def test2():
 with open('config.json') as f:
 config = json.load(f)
 print(config)
 credentials = config['gsheet_credentials']
 sheet_id = config['campaigns'][0]['sheet_id']
 client = authenticate_gspread(credentials)
 sf_connection = SalesforceConnection(config['username'], config['password'], config['security_token'])
 res = sf_connection.get_applications(['GA-Cat.*'])
 data = [[] for _ in range(len(res)+1)]
 sheet = client.open_by_key(sheet_id).sheet1
 data[0] = ['#', 'Account ID', 'Application ID', 'Campaign', 'Advertised Title', 'Date', 'Country', 'Outcome']
 i = 1
 for row in res:
 # Processing each row

content.title: gsheets.py
content.visibleText:
import gspread

# Set up the credentials
def authenticate_gspread(json_credentials):
    scope = ['https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets']
    client = gspread.service_account_from_dict(json_credentials, scopes=scope)
    return client

client = authenticate_gspread(credentials)
SELECT Id, AccountId, CampaignId, CreatedDate, Lead_Source_Campaign__c, Advertised_Title__c, Candidate_Country__c, CCAT_Score__c, Last_Active_Stage__c, StageName
FROM Opportunity WHERE
    CampaignId IN (SELECT Id from Campaign WHERE Name like 'GA-Cat.%') ORDER BY CreatedDate
Found 2000 records
Found 2524 records
